Package moulton.scalable.texts

Interface HotKeyTextComponent

All Superinterfaces:
TextInputComponent
All Known Implementing Classes:
StaticTextBox, TextBox
public interface HotKeyTextComponent
extends TextInputComponent
Implementations of HotkeyTextComponent are instances of Clickable that can react to the hot key commands of "copy", "cut", "paste", and "select all". The MenuManager associated with this component, is in charge of detecting when these hot key commands are performed by the user, and to call corresponding events. Moreover, the manager will copy the text returned by copy() and cut() to the system clip board, and will give the contents of the system clipboard (when it can be represented as a string) in the calling of paste(String).
Author:
Matthew Moulton

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String copy()
    Called by the MenuManager when it registers a copy request from the user.
    java.lang.String cut()
    Called by the MenuManager when it registers a cut request from the user.
    boolean isHotKeyEnabled()
    Even though a class may have the potential to use hot keys, there is a layer of flexibility as to whether hot keys will be operable for specific instances.
    void paste​(java.lang.String pasteText)
    Called by the MenuManager when it registers a paste command from the user.
    void selectAll()
    Called by the MenuManager when it registers a select all command from the user.

    appendMessage, removeMessage

  • Method Details

    • copy

      java.lang.String copy()
      Called by the MenuManager when it registers a copy request from the user.
      Returns:
      the text from this component that should be copied to the clip board

    • cut

      java.lang.String cut()
      Called by the MenuManager when it registers a cut request from the user.
      Returns:
      the text from this component that should be copied to the clip board

    • paste

      void paste​(java.lang.String pasteText)
      Called by the MenuManager when it registers a paste command from the user.
      Parameters:
      pasteText - the text that was pasted into this component from the clip board

    • selectAll

      void selectAll()
      Called by the MenuManager when it registers a select all command from the user.

    • isHotKeyEnabled

      boolean isHotKeyEnabled()
      Even though a class may have the potential to use hot keys, there is a layer of flexibility as to whether hot keys will be operable for specific instances.
      Returns:
      whether the instance should allow the MenuManager to alter its contents by user hot key input
